column1: [Scotto] The Chicago Bulls have agreed to an Exhibit 10 deal with Ethan Thompson (Oregon state), a league source told @HoopsHype.

[Marks] Contract info on the signings in Chicago: Stanley Johnson, Ethan Thompson and Matt Thomas are non-guaranteed. Alize Johnson has a $250K guarantee if no waivers by 10/19. His second year has a 7/2 guaranteed date. 13 guaranteed and 4 non-guaranteed.
The Chicago Bulls haved waived Daniel Oturu and Ethan Thompson
[Bulls] The Chicago Bulls have waived guard Ethan Thompson & center Daniel Oturu.
